scripts.start: browserify -t babelify views/main.jsx -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] --transform-key=production --standalone main -o public/main.js && uglifyjs public/main.js -c -m -o public/main.js && lessc public/main.less public/main.css && pm2 stop index && pm2 start index.js --env production --update-env
scripts.restart: pm2 stop all && browserify -t babelify views/main.jsx --standalone main -o public/main.js  && pm2 start index.js --watch
